allData.name: DIN 933 Hexagon Head Full Thread Bolt
allData.description: DIN 933 is a standard that defines fully threaded hexagon head bolts. These bolts provide a strong grip due to their robust structures and fully threaded bodies. The hexagonal head design allows for easy assembly with standard wrenches and tools. With high tensile strength, these bolts offer reliable fastening, especially in metal connections. They are available in various diameters and lengths, typically made from stainless steel or carbon steel.

allData.name: DIN 931 Hexagon Head Partial Thread Bolt
allData.description: DIN 931 defines hexagon head bolts with partial thread (half thread). These bolts have a partially threaded shaft, where the thread covers only a portion of the bolt, leaving the rest smooth. The hexagonal head allows for easy tightening and loosening with standard tools. DIN 931 bolts are typically used in applications requiring high tensile strength and secure connections. Available in a variety of sizes and diameters, they are commonly made from stainless steel or steel.

allData.name: DIN 6921 Flanged Bolt
allData.title2: Hexagon Socket Button Head Screws Flange Without Serration
allData.description: DIN 6921 defines flange head bolts, which feature an integrated flange (a flat and expanded area) under the head. This design eliminates the need for additional washers and provides better load distribution over a larger surface area. The flange reduces the risk of slippage at connection points and offers a more secure grip during tightening. These bolts are commonly used in industries such as automotive, mechanical engineering, and metalworking. DIN 6921 bolts are made from durable materials like steel and stainless steel and are available in various sizes.

allData.name: DIN 912 Socket Head Cap Screw
allData.description: DIN 912 defines cylindrical head bolts with an internal hex socket (Allen). These bolts are used in applications that require high tightening torque and precise assembly. The Allen socket design allows easy tightening with standard hex keys and provides installation in confined spaces. The cylindrical head offers a sleek appearance while ensuring strong connections. DIN 912 bolts are commonly used in mechanical engineering, automotive, and industrial equipment. They are made from durable materials like steel and stainless steel and are available in various sizes.

allData.name: DIN 7991 - ISO 10642 Countersunk Head Socket Screw
allData.description: DIN 7991 (ISO 10642) defines countersunk head bolts with an internal hex socket (Allen). These bolts provide a flat and clean mounting surface as their heads sit flush with the surface. The Allen head design allows easy tightening with hex keys and is ideal for precision applications. DIN 7991 bolts are commonly used in mechanical engineering and metal connections, especially in areas requiring a low-profile and aesthetic appearance. Made from stainless steel or steel, they are available in various sizes and materials.

allData.name: ISO 7380 Button Head Socket Cap Screw
allData.description: ISO 7380 Button Head Socket Cap Screws are specialized fasteners designed for applications requiring high strength and durability. The rounded button head design allows for a smooth, aesthetically pleasing finish that sits flush with the surface. Typically made from stainless steel or high-grade alloys, these screws offer excellent corrosion resistance. The ISO 7380 standard ensures precise dimensions, tolerances, and mechanical properties, making them reliable and performance-oriented. They are widely used in industries such as automotive, mechanical engineering, and construction.

allData.name: ISO 7380 - 2 Button Head Flanged Socket Screw
allData.title2: Hexagon Socket Button Head Screws With Flange
allData.description: ISO 7380-2 Button Head Flanged Socket Cap Screws feature a domed head for a sleek appearance, while the flange design helps distribute the load over a larger surface area. The internal hex drive allows for easy tightening and ensures high torque resistance. These screws are commonly used in industries like automotive, mechanical engineering, and metalworking. Made from stainless steel or steel, they are available in various sizes and diameters to meet different application needs.

allData.name: DIN 6912 Low Head Socket Cap Screw
allData.description: DIN 6912 Socket Cap Screws with Reduced Head are designed for applications in confined spaces, where their compact head allows easy installation. The internal hex drive ensures convenient tightening with standard hex keys and offers high torque resistance. These screws are ideal for use in mechanical engineering, automotive, and industrial applications. Made from steel or stainless steel, they are available in various sizes to suit different requirements.

allData.name: DIN 976 Threaded Rod
allData.description: DIN 976 Fully Threaded Rods, also known as stud bolts, feature threading along their entire length. These rods can be cut to the desired length and are used in fastening, assembly, and construction applications. DIN 976 rods offer high strength and tensile resistance, ensuring reliable connections. They are made from durable materials like steel and stainless steel and are available in various diameters and lengths to suit different needs.

allData.name: DIN 603 Square Neck Carriage Bolt
allData.description: DIN 603 Carriage Bolts, characterized by a round and flat head with a square neck beneath the head, prevent rotation during installation. The square portion anchors the bolt securely in place, making them ideal for wood-to-metal or wood-to-wood connections. The flat, round head offers a clean, decorative finish, while the square neck ensures a stable fit in the mounting surface. DIN 603 bolts are commonly used in furniture, fencing, and construction projects. They are made from durable materials like steel and stainless steel, available in various sizes.

allData.name: DIN 444 Eye Bolt
allData.description: DIN 444 Eye Bolts are specialized fasteners with a circular loop at the end, designed for creating secure and movable connections. The loop allows attachment to hooks, pins, or other fasteners, making them ideal for applications requiring rotational or flexible connections. These bolts are commonly used in mechanical engineering, construction, rigging, and load-bearing systems. Made from high-strength steel or stainless steel, DIN 444 eye bolts are available in various diameters and lengths to suit different industrial needs.

allData.name: DIN 316 Wing Bolt
allData.description: DIN 316 Wing Bolts feature a butterfly-shaped head, allowing for easy hand tightening and loosening without tools, making them ideal for quick assembly and disassembly. The wing design provides a practical fastening solution for applications requiring frequent adjustments. These bolts are commonly used in industrial, automotive, and general engineering sectors. DIN 316 wing bolts are made from durable steel or stainless steel, and they are available in various sizes and diameters to meet different installation needs.

allData.name: DIN 934 Hex Nut
allData.description: DIN 934 defines hexagon nuts, which are used to securely fasten bolts at connection points. These nuts feature a hexagonal shape that allows for easy tightening and loosening with standard wrenches, ensuring a practical assembly process. DIN 934 nuts are commonly used in a variety of industrial applications such as construction, automotive, and mechanical engineering. Typically made from steel or stainless steel for high durability and strength, they are available in various sizes and thread options to fit different bolt dimensions.

allData.name: DIN 6923 Hex Flanged Nut (Serrated)
allData.title2: Hexagon Nuts - With Flange and Serration
allData.description: DIN 6923 Hex Flange Nuts (Serrated) are fasteners that, in addition to the standard hex nut design, feature a flanged base and often a serrated surface. The flange provides a larger contact area, distributing pressure over a wider surface and helping to prevent the bolt from loosening. The serrated surface enhances grip against the material it is fastened to, making it ideal for applications with vibration, as it helps prevent loosening. These nuts, conforming to the DIN 6923 standard, are commonly used in the machinery, automotive, and construction industries.

allData.name: DIN 985 Hex Lock Nut
allData.title2: Peravailing Torque Type Hexagon Nuts With Non-Metalic Insert, Thin Type
allData.description: DIN 985 defines hexagonal locking nuts with a nylon (fiber) insert at the top, which helps prevent loosening due to vibrations and impacts. The hexagonal head design allows for easy tightening and loosening with standard tools. These nuts are commonly preferred in automotive, mechanical engineering, and industrial applications to ensure secure connections. They are made from durable materials such as steel and stainless steel and are available in various sizes and thread options, providing long-lasting and reliable connections.

allData.name: DIN 439 Thin Hex Nut (Counter)
allData.title2: Hexagon Nuts Thin Type, Type B, With Chamfer
allData.description: DIN 439 specifies hexagonal thin (lock) nuts designed for use in confined spaces or applications requiring double nut configurations. Their slim profile allows them to be easily used on top of standard nuts to prevent loosening. The hexagonal head design enables straightforward tightening and loosening with standard tools. DIN 439 nuts are commonly utilized in automotive, mechanical engineering, and general industrial applications. They are manufactured from high-strength materials such as steel or stainless steel and are available in various size options.

allData.name: DIN 1587 Blind Nut
allData.title2: Hexagon Domed Cap Nuts High Type
allData.description: DIN 1587 defines blind nuts, which feature a closed (blind) head structure. This design protects the threaded portion of the nut from external elements and provides an aesthetically pleasing appearance. The closed structure prevents the screw end from protruding, thereby enhancing safety. Blind nuts are commonly used in mechanical engineering, furniture construction, and the automotive industry. They are manufactured from durable materials such as steel and stainless steel, available in various size options. These nuts serve as ideal fastening elements for both functional and decorative purposes.

allData.name: DIN 986 Fiber Blind Nut
allData.title2: Self Locking Hexagon Domed Cap Nuts
allData.description: DIN 986 specifies fiber-filled blind nuts, which feature a closed (blind) head structure and include a nylon (fiber) ring on the inside. This nylon ring prevents the nut from loosening after tightening, providing a reliable connection against vibrations and impacts. The closed head structure also prevents the screw end from protruding, offering both aesthetic and protective functions. DIN 986 nuts are commonly used in the automotive, mechanical engineering, and furniture industries. Made from durable materials such as stainless steel and steel, these nuts are available in various sizes.

allData.name: DIN 557 Square Nut
allData.description: DIN 557 square nuts are connection elements specifically designed for applications requiring a wide surface area. The square shape ensures better contact with the surface where the nut is fixed, facilitating more effective force distribution. Typically made from durable materials such as stainless steel, DIN 557 nuts are used alongside bolts and screw systems to create strong and reliable connections. They are commonly preferred in various industrial sectors, including construction, automotive, and mechanical engineering.

allData.name: DIN 928 Square Weld Nut
allData.description: DIN 928 square weld nuts are connection elements specifically designed for welded fastening applications. Their square shape provides a wide surface area, ensuring better compatibility with the weld point and creating high strength. These nuts are typically welded onto metal surfaces, preventing movement during installation. Manufactured according to DIN 928 standards, these nuts are widely used in the automotive, construction, and machinery sectors to provide reliable connections. Made from stainless steel or high-quality alloys, they offer resistance to corrosion.

allData.name: DIN 929 Hex Weld Nut
allData.description: DIN 929 hexagonal weld nuts are designed for applications that require welding for fastening. These nuts are engineered to break away at a predetermined torque, ensuring that they can only be installed with a specific tightening force, making unauthorized tampering difficult. Broken nuts are commonly used in situations where theft protection is needed or to prevent unauthorized removal of secured connections. Manufactured according to DIN 9305 standards, they are widely used in infrastructure, construction, and public projects where safety measures are critical.

allData.name: DIN 1481 Slotted Pin

Coil pins are widely used in machinery, automotive, and various industrial applications.

allData.name: DIN 7 Cylinder Pin

They are typically designed to have high tolerances and a tight fit. Manufactured from materials such as steel, stainless steel, or hardened steel, these pins are commonly used to align assembly parts or secure mechanical components. allData.name: DIN 6799 Snap Ring
allData.description: DIN 6799 retaining rings, also known as 'E rings' or 'click rings,' are spring-loaded fastening elements that are installed on shafts. They ensure the proper positioning of bearing and guiding components on the shaft. With their 'E' shaped design, they sit on the outside of the shaft and provide a secure grip through lateral pressure. Typically made from steel, these rings can be coated for corrosion resistance. They are widely used in automotive, machinery, and electronic assembly applications, offering ease of installation and removal.

allData.name: DIN 471 Shaft Ring
allData.description: DIN 471 shaft rings are circular retaining elements that are installed on shafts. Commonly known as 'external rings,' they are used to secure components on the shaft. Designed to fit around the circumference of the shaft, they are installed using specialized pliers during the assembly process. Typically made from steel, these rings can also be coated for corrosion resistance. They prevent the movement of machine parts, bearings, or other components by holding them in place. DIN 471 rings are used in automotive, machinery manufacturing, and various industrial applications, providing a durable and reliable connection.

allData.name: DIN 472 Internal Ring
allData.description: DIN 472 internal rings are circular retaining elements that are placed inside holes. Known as 'internal rings,' they are typically used to secure components within the hole. The ring is installed into the inner diameter of the hole, and assembly is performed using specialized pliers. Made from steel, these rings are generally coated for corrosion resistance. They are widely used in automotive, machinery, and industrial applications to ensure the stability of bearings or other components. DIN 472 internal rings provide a robust and secure grip.

allData.name: DIN 94 Cotter Pin
allData.description: DIN 94 cotter pins are U-shaped metal wires commonly used to secure nuts, pins, or other fastening elements. After being passed through a hole, the ends of the cotter pin are bent to secure it in place. They are made from materials such as stainless steel, carbon steel, or brass, and can be coated for corrosion resistance. Cotter pins are widely used in automotive, machinery, and heavy industrial applications to prevent the loosening of mechanical parts. They are easy to install and provide a strong locking mechanism.

allData.name: DIN 71412 Grease Fitting
allData.description: DIN 71412 grease fittings are fastening elements used to ensure the lubrication of machine parts. These components allow grease to be injected using a lubrication gun. Grease fittings are typically made from steel or brass and can be coated for corrosion resistance. They can be produced at various angles (straight, 45°, and 90°) to facilitate easy lubrication of components in different positions. Commonly used in automotive, heavy industry, agricultural machinery, and other mechanical systems, grease fittings provide easy access for regular maintenance, helping to prevent wear and tear on parts.

allData.name: Cabin Screw
allData.description: Cabinet screws are a specialized type of screw used primarily for the assembly of metal and wooden cabinets. Designed to join thin and sturdy materials, these screws typically feature a round or flat head. They are often made from stainless steel, offering resistance to corrosion. The sharp threads of cabinet screws provide a secure and sturdy grip on metal surfaces. Commonly used in electrical panels, machine enclosures, and furniture assembly, these screws offer both decorative and functional connections.

allData.name: Cylinder Pull Allen Screw
allData.description: Cylindrical pull allen screw, also known as an Allen screw, is a type of screw specifically used for the assembly or disassembly of cylindrical parts. With its hexagonal socket head, this screw can be tightened or loosened using an Allen wrench. Typically made from steel, it is preferred for applications that require high strength. In cylindrical pull operations, it helps safely apply pulling force to remove components. Commonly used in automotive, machinery, and industrial assembly processes, this screw provides a durable and reliable connection.

allData.name: Clip Anchor
allData.description: Clip anchor is a type of fastening element used specifically for mounting lightweight and medium-weight loads. Made from plastic or metal, it is commonly used on surfaces such as concrete, brick, or drywall. After placing the anchor into the hole, when the screw is tightened, the clip design of the anchor expands and grips securely within the wall, providing a safe hold. It is widely preferred for applications such as furniture assembly, shelf securing, and lighting fixtures. Offering easy installation, it ensures a solid fastening.

allData.name: Bolt Tube Anchor
allData.description: Bolt tube anchor is a type of fastening element used in installations with high load-bearing capacity. This type of anchor is hollow and cylindrical, providing a strong connection thanks to the bolt placed inside. When the bolt is tightened, the cylinder expands and grips securely within the hole, ensuring a safe hold. It is commonly used on concrete, brick, and other hard surfaces. It is preferred for applications requiring high strength, such as heavy structures, steel constructions, and machine assemblies. Offering both durability and reliability, it ensures a solid fastening.

allData.name: Sheet Sleeve Anchor
allData.description: Sheet sleeve anchor is a fastening element used in applications requiring high durability. This type of anchor is covered with a metal sleeve, which expands and grips tightly to the surface when a screw or bolt is tightened after being placed into the hole. This design provides a strong hold for securing heavy loads. Sheet sleeve anchors are typically used on concrete, brick, and stone surfaces. They are commonly preferred in construction, steel structure assembly, and industrial applications. Known for their durability and reliability, they ensure a secure fastening.

allData.name: DIN 3570 U Bolt
allData.description: DIN 3570 U bolt is a 'U'-shaped fastening element used for securing piping systems, poles, and round profile structures. This bolt has threaded ends and is commonly used to mount pipes or round objects to surfaces. Made from steel or stainless steel, it can be coated for corrosion resistance. It provides a solid installation when secured with nuts and washers. Frequently utilized in construction, piping systems, automotive, and industrial applications, the U bolt offers a strong hold and reliable connection due to its durable design.

allData.name: DIN 766 Chain
allData.description: DIN 766 Chain is a connecting element manufactured according to specific standards, commonly used in lifting, pulling, and securing applications. These chains consist of short links produced with the same size and tolerances, making them particularly suitable for horizontal load-bearing and maritime applications. Made from steel, they can be galvanized for corrosion resistance. DIN 766 chains are utilized in crane systems, anchorages, boat mooring, and industrial transport operations. With high durability and standard dimensions, they offer a reliable and long-lasting solution.

allData.name: DIN 125 Flat Washer (Type A)
allData.title2: Plain Washers - Type A Without Chamfer
allData.description: DIN 125 Flat Washer (Type A) is a flat, circular metal disc used under bolts or nuts. Its primary purpose is to distribute the clamping force over a larger surface area, ensuring a secure and stable connection. This type of washer is typically made from steel, stainless steel, or brass and may have a coating for corrosion resistance. DIN 125 washers are commonly used in general mechanical assembly applications and help protect the surfaces joined by bolts or nuts. They serve as a standard and durable fastening element.

allData.name: ART 9055 EPDM Sealed Washer
allData.description: ART 9055 EPDM Sealed Washer is a fastening element featuring an EPDM (Ethylene Propylene Diene Monomer) rubber seal positioned in the center of a metal washer. When a bolt or screw is tightened, this washer provides a seal between surfaces, preventing the passage of water, air, and other external factors. The EPDM material offers excellent resistance to weather, water, and UV rays, making it ideal for outdoor applications. It is commonly used in roofing, waterproofing, facade installations, and ventilation systems. The combination of metal and seal ensures both durability and reliable sealing.

allData.name: DIN 6798 Serrated Washer (Type A)
allData.description: DIN 6798 Serrated Washer (Type A) is a washer specifically designed to prevent loosening in bolt and nut connections, featuring a serrated edge on its outer circumference. The serrated edges grip tightly to the surface of the fastener during installation, helping to prevent loosening caused by vibrations or external factors. Typically made from steel or stainless steel, it can also be coated for corrosion resistance. These washers are widely used in machine assemblies, automotive applications, electronics, and industrial settings due to their ability to provide a secure and robust connection.

allData.name: DIN 6796 Cup Washer
allData.description: DIN 6796 Cup Washer is a type of conical spring washer used in bolt connections that require high pre-tension forces. This washer distributes the force applied during tightening over a wide surface area, enhancing the tightness of the connection and preventing the bolt from loosening. Its bowl-shaped design provides elastic pressure, which helps to prevent loosening of the fasteners due to external factors such as vibrations or thermal expansion. Typically manufactured from steel or stainless steel, DIN 6796 Belleville washers are commonly used in high-performance and reliability-demanding fields such as machine manufacturing, automotive, and the energy sector.

allData.name: Copper and Aluminum Washer
allData.description: Copper and Aluminum Washers are flat washers made from two different metals, typically used to distribute loads on fasteners and reduce vibrations. Copper washers are preferred in applications requiring electrical connections and heat transfer due to their high conductivity, corrosion resistance, and flexibility. On the other hand, aluminum washers stand out for their lightweight nature, good corrosion resistance, and cost-effectiveness. Both types of washers are commonly used in the automotive, construction, electrical, and machinery sectors. They provide ideal solutions for ensuring sealing at connection points, preventing wear, and stopping fasteners from loosening. Copper and aluminum washers contribute to long-lasting assemblies by providing reliable connections in various environments and conditions.

allData.name: O-Ring Super Washer
allData.description: O-ring Super Washer is a fastening element equipped with an O-ring that provides enhanced sealing and vibration isolation in addition to standard washers. The O-ring, typically made from rubber or elastomer materials, is positioned within the washer to act as a flexible seal during the tightening process, effectively preventing leaks in systems under pressure, liquid, or gas. O-ring Super Washers are utilized in applications requiring high sealing performance and durability, such as automotive, hydraulic, pneumatic, and machinery systems. The O-ring helps to prevent loosening due to vibrations and ensures the longevity of connections, offering a reliable and secure solution for high-performance assembly processes.

allData.name: DIN 9021 Wide Washer
allData.title2: Plain Washers With Outside Diameter - 3x Norminal Thread Diameter
allData.description: DIN 9021 Wide Washer is a type of washer designed to optimize load distribution and minimize surface damage in fastening applications. Typically made from durable materials like steel or stainless steel, these wide flat washers are commonly used across various industrial applications. Their broad surface area allows them to cover more ground beneath screws or nuts, reducing the risk of compression and loosening of fasteners. DIN 9021 washers are preferred in construction, automotive, machinery, and electrical sectors. They can be used to provide both sealing and resistance against vibrations and shocks. Offering easy installation and reliable performance, DIN 9021 Wide Washers stand out due to their durability and versatility in different applications.

allData.name: DIN 127 Spring Washer (Type B)
allData.title2: Spring Lock Washers Type B, Plain Pattern
allData.description: DIN 127 Spring Washer (Type B) is a specialized type of washer designed to enhance the security of fasteners and prevent loosening. Its spring-like structure balances the tightening force applied during installation, helping to maintain the integrity of the connection over time. Typically made from durable materials such as steel or stainless steel, these washers are available in various sizes. DIN 127 Type B Spring Washers are commonly used in automotive, machinery, and construction sectors. They provide resistance against vibrations and improve the performance of fasteners. Offering easy installation, these washers are an ideal solution for creating reliable and long-lasting connections.

allData.name: IST 1021 Zero Head Round Nut Rivet
allData.title2: Blind Rivet Nuts With Small Head
allData.description: IST 1021 Zero Head Round Nut Rivet is a specialized rivet nut characterized by its zero head design. These nuts are specifically designed for use as fasteners on flat surfaces, providing an aesthetically pleasing appearance. Thanks to their rounded head structure, they ensure a tight and reliable connection without compromising the external appearance during installation. IST 1021 is typically made from steel or stainless steel, making it resistant to corrosion. The zero head design minimizes the space occupied in the mounting area, helping users optimize their functional space. Preferred in automotive, construction, and general industrial applications, these nuts offer durability and high performance as reliable fastening elements.

allData.name: IST 1025 Flanged Round Nut Rivet

allData.description: IST 1025 Flanged Round Nut Rivet is a specialized fastener distinguished by its flanged design. This nut optimizes load distribution by providing extra surface area during installation, thereby enhancing the strength of the connection. Its round head structure offers an aesthetically pleasing appearance while ensuring secure compression without occupying excessive space in the application area. IST 1025 is typically made from durable materials such as steel or stainless steel, making it resistant to corrosion. The flanged design prevents the nut from slipping during installation, ensuring a reliable and stable connection. Commonly used in automotive, construction, machinery, and general industrial applications, this nut is an ideal choice for long-lasting and high-performance fastening solutions.

allData.description: IST 1027-A Zero Head Full Hex Nut Rivet is designed to provide an aesthetic and reliable connection on flat surfaces. allData.name: IST 1027-D Flanged Half Hex Nut Rivet

allData.name: DIN 32501 Spot Weld Bolt (Single Point and Triple Point)
allData.description: DIN 32501 Spot Weld Screw (Single Point and Triple Point) is a specialized type of screw designed for connecting metal parts. These screws are mounted using the spot welding method, providing high durability. The single-point and three-point versions are tailored for different application needs; the single-point version is ideal for situations requiring simpler and faster assembly, while the three-point version offers additional stability and load-bearing capacity. Typically made from steel or stainless steel, DIN 32501 screws are resistant to corrosion and ensure long-lasting performance. Widely preferred in automotive, construction, and general industrial applications, these screws are an excellent choice for creating reliable connections. The spot weld screw design facilitates quick and efficient assembly processes, enhancing production efficiency.

allData.name: DIN 7337 Pop Rivet
allData.description: DIN 7337 Pop Rivet is a fastener designed to provide high reliability and durability in assembly operations. These rivets are used to hold two or more parts together, particularly in light to medium load-bearing applications. They stand out for their ease of use; they can be applied from a single side, saving time and labor. DIN 7337 rivets can be made from various materials, including aluminum, steel, or stainless steel, offering solutions tailored to different application needs. Widely used in automotive, construction, machinery, and general industrial applications, pop rivets are known for their high durability and sealing properties, creating reliable and long-lasting connections.

allData.name: DIN 7337 Multigrip Rivet
allData.description: DIN 7337 Multigrip Rivet is a high-strength fastening element designed to hold materials of varying thicknesses together. Thanks to its multigrip feature, this rivet provides flexibility by accommodating different thicknesses in a single application. The ability for one-sided installation simplifies the assembly process, saving both time and effort. Typically made from durable materials such as aluminum, steel, or stainless steel, DIN 7337 rivets ensure resistance to corrosion and long-lasting performance. Commonly used in automotive, construction, and general industrial applications, multigrip rivets offer reliable and sturdy connections, demonstrating superior performance across various application areas.

allData.name: IST 7337 Hemlock Rivet (Heavy Duty)
allData.description: IST 7337 Hemlok Rivet (Heavy Duty) is a specialized fastening element designed to provide high load-bearing capacity and durability. These rivets feature a robust design that ensures a reliable connection during installation while offering high strength. Ideal for heavy-duty applications, Hemlok rivets have an extended flange structure that enhances stability and increases the security of connection points. Typically manufactured from high-quality steel or stainless steel, this material choice ensures resistance to corrosion and delivers long-lasting performance. Widely used in automotive, construction, machinery, and other industrial sectors, these rivets create reliable and sturdy connections even under challenging conditions. The Hemlok design also facilitates the assembly process, improving overall efficiency.

allData.name: IST 7337-P Octopus Rivet (Spider)
allData.description: IST 7337-P Octopus Rivet (Spider) is a specialized fastening element designed to provide high strength and durability. These rivets feature multiple connection points, offering a broad surface area that ensures a strong grip between the materials being assembled. This characteristic makes them ideal for complex structures and heavy-load applications. Typically made from steel or stainless steel, IST 7337-P rivets are resistant to corrosion, ensuring long-lasting use. They are widely preferred in automotive, construction, and industrial applications, providing high reliability and durability to create robust connections. The octopus design enhances flexibility and reliability during assembly, while also saving labor and time.

allData.name: Adjustable Hose Clamps
allData.description: Adjustable Hose Clamps are practical connection elements designed to securely fasten hoses and provide leak-proof seals. The Type A 8.5mm DKP Clamp is suitable for hoses with a diameter of 8.5 mm and is made from DKP (Flat Tile Stainless) material. Its adjustable design allows it to accommodate hoses of varying thicknesses, ensuring a tight connection. The Type B 13mm DKP Clamp, on the other hand, is designed for hoses with a diameter of 13 mm and is similarly manufactured from DKP material, providing a reliable grip for larger diameter hoses. Both types of clamps are widely used in water and liquid transport systems and offer easy installation and removal, simplifying maintenance and repair processes. Their adjustable designs maximize the need for leak-proof connections, ensuring secure and efficient fastening.

allData.name: Type A and B Stainless Steel Hose Clamp
allData.description: Type A and Type B Stainless Steel Hose Clamps are corrosion-resistant and durable connection elements designed for long-lasting performance. The Type A Clamp is suitable for small-diameter hoses and provides reliable leak-proof seals with its adjustable design. In contrast, the Type B Clamp is designed for larger-diameter hoses and maintains its performance even in demanding conditions due to its robust construction. Both types offer quick installation, facilitating maintenance processes and ensuring secure connections. These clamps are widely used in various fields, including automotive, industrial, and agricultural applications.

allData.name: Reinforced (Heavy Duty) Clamp
allData.description: Reinforced (Heavy-Duty) Clamps are connection elements specifically designed to provide high strength and durability. Manufactured for heavy-duty applications, these clamps deliver reliable performance in challenging conditions and are commonly used in industrial and automotive sectors. Their reinforced structure allows for high pressure and load-bearing capacity. Made from stainless steel or other durable materials, these clamps resist corrosion and offer long-lasting use. Additionally, their adjustable designs ensure excellent compatibility with hoses of varying diameters and thicknesses, facilitating the installation process while providing a leak-proof seal. Reinforced (Heavy-Duty) Clamps not only create secure connections but also greatly ease maintenance and repair processes.

allData.name: Type C Stainless Steel Hose Clamp
allData.description: Type C Stainless Steel Hose Clamps are connection elements made from stainless steel, offering high durability and corrosion resistance. Designed specifically for automotive, industrial, and agricultural applications, these clamps ensure secure connections for hoses of various diameters and thicknesses. The C-Type design features an adjustable structure that provides excellent compatibility with different hose sizes while ensuring reliable sealing. Additionally, they facilitate easy installation and removal, allowing for quick maintenance operations. With their high strength, these clamps deliver dependable performance even in challenging conditions, offering long-lasting and effective use.

allData.name: Type D Stainless Steel Hose Clamp
allData.description: Type D Stainless Steel Hose Clamps are connection elements made from stainless steel, offering corrosion resistance and high strength. Designed to securely connect hoses of various diameters and thicknesses, these clamps are commonly used in automotive, industrial applications, and agriculture. The D-Type design features an adjustable structure that ensures excellent sealing based on user needs. Additionally, it simplifies the installation process, saving time. With their high durability, these clamps deliver reliable performance even in harsh weather conditions. Offering long-lasting use and robust construction, D-Type Stainless Steel Hose Clamps provide an effective and dependable solution for your connection needs.

allData.name: Leaf Hinge
allData.description: Leaf hinges are essential connection elements used to facilitate the opening and closing of movable surfaces such as doors and windows. Typically made from metal or stainless steel, leaf hinges are favored for their durability and long-lasting structure across various applications. This type of hinge features two leaf sections that rotate around a central axis. When properly installed, the hinge leaves allow for secure and smooth operation of doors or windows. Additionally, leaf hinges contribute aesthetically with their decorative appearances. Available in different sizes and designs, they can be used in both indoor and outdoor applications. Their resistance to water, moisture, and weather conditions ensures a durable and functional solution.

The HSS DIN 338 cylindrical shank short drill bit is an ideal choice for professional and industrial applications.

allData.name: HSS DIN 352 Metric Normal Thread 3-Piece Tap Set Guide

allData.description: Brass Wood Screw DIN 97 is a specialized fastener designed for securely joining wooden materials. Its round head structure ensures a snug fit against wood surfaces, providing both strength and an aesthetically pleasing appearance. Made from brass, it offers excellent corrosion resistance and durability, resulting in long-lasting connections. This wood screw is commonly used in furniture manufacturing, wooden structures, and various woodworking projects. It allows for effective assembly without damaging the natural structure of the wood, ensuring a strong and reliable connection.

allData.name: Brass Cylinder Head Screw DIN 84
allData.description: Brass Cylinder Head Screw DIN 84 is a fastener made from high-quality brass, featuring a cylindrical head design. Its cross-recessed slot allows for easy tightening and loosening with a screwdriver. The brass material provides corrosion resistance, while manufacturing in accordance with DIN 84 standards ensures a reliable connection. This screw is commonly used in electrical equipment, furniture assembly, and various light assembly applications. Its functionality and aesthetic appeal make it a preferred choice for a wide range of uses.

allData.name: Brass Star Cylinder Head Screw DIN 7985
allData.description: Brass Star Cylinder Head Screw DIN 7985 features a star (Torx) head design that provides superior grip and torque transmission, reducing the risk of slipping during tightening. The brass material offers resistance to corrosion, ensuring long-lasting use. Manufactured in accordance with DIN 7985 standards, it guarantees a reliable connection. This screw is commonly used in electronic devices, automotive components, and light assembly applications. Its aesthetic appearance and functionality make it ideal for various applications.

allData.name: Prismatic Modular Stainless Steel and Galvanized Water Tanks
allData.description: Prismatic modular water tanks offer durable and reliable water storage solutions with long-lasting, high-quality materials. With stainless steel and galvanized options, these tanks provide maximum corrosion resistance and adapt to various environmental conditions. Their modular design allows for customizable capacities and dimensions, offering a practical solution for any need, while ensuring easy installation and maintenance. Ideal for both drinking water and industrial use, these water tanks stand out for their hygienic structure and leak-proof guarantee.

allData.name: Prismatic Modular GRP Water Tanks
allData.description: Prismatic modular GRP (Glass Fiber Reinforced Plastic) water tanks are among the most reliable options in water storage, offering superior strength and long-lasting performance. GRP material provides high resistance to corrosion and chemical wear, while its lightweight design ensures easy transport and quick installation. The modular structure allows for customization in different sizes and capacities, making it an ideal solution for both residential and industrial applications. With its hygienic design and leak-proof features, GRP tanks are perfect for drinking water storage. For those seeking safety, durability, and flexibility in water storage, GRP tanks provide an economical and high-performance solution!

allData.name: Cylindrical Welded Stainless Steel Water Tanks
allData.description: Cylindrical welded stainless steel water tanks are an ideal choice for those seeking high durability and excellent performance in water storage solutions. Made from stainless steel, these tanks offer superior resistance to corrosion and wear, ensuring long-lasting and reliable water storage. The cylindrical design optimizes storage space and provides flexibility with various capacity options for both residential and industrial applications. With a welded structure, they guarantee leak-proof performance, while their hygienic properties ensure compliance with drinking water standards. Resistant to temperature fluctuations, chemical exposure, and mechanical stress, cylindrical welded stainless steel water tanks offer a reliable water storage solution. With guaranteed high quality and longevity, they ensure your water remains safe and fresh at all times!

allData.name: Prismatic Modular Special Coated Water Tanks
allData.description: Prismatic modular water tanks with special coatings offer advanced protection and performance for modern water storage solutions. The special coating technology shields the tank's interior from various chemical and physical factors, ensuring long-lasting and reliable use. With a modular design, these tanks can be customized to different sizes and capacities to meet your specific needs, providing flexibility for both residential and industrial applications. The prismatic shape optimizes space utilization and offers ease of installation. The special coating ensures the tanks remain hygienic and compliant with drinking water standards, preserving water quality and providing leak-proof performance.

allData.name: Mold Release Spray (With Silicone / Without Silicone)
allData.description: Mold release sprays are specially formulated to ensure clean and easy separation of molds and surfaces. The silicone-based mold release spray provides excellent release performance and a smooth finish due to its silicone formula, making it highly effective under high temperatures and pressure. This spray facilitates the effortless removal of products from molds, saving both time and labor during the production process. On the other hand, silicone-free mold release sprays are ideal for delicate surfaces and specific applications, leaving no residue behind and delivering optimal results, especially in painting, coating, or adhesive processes. Both options offer high-quality and reliable performance across various industrial applications, ensuring effective and dependable results in your production processes.

allData.name: Brake Pad Industrial Cleaner
allData.description: Brake pad industrial cleaner effectively removes dirt, oil, and dust from brake systems. With its powerful solvent formula, it thoroughly cleans the surfaces of brake pads and components, enhancing their performance. The cleaner evaporates quickly without leaving any residue and is suitable for industrial use. It helps prevent performance issues and ensures the longevity of brake systems.

allData.name: Liquid Grease
allData.description: Liquid grease is specially formulated for lubricating moving parts and reducing friction. Its high-quality lubrication properties enhance the performance of machinery and equipment while preventing wear. Additionally, it remains effective across a wide temperature range and provides protection against corrosion and oxidation. Ideal for industrial applications, it offers long-lasting and reliable performance.

allData.name: Gas Welding Spray (Without Silicone)
allData.description: Gas welding spray is formulated without silicone to reduce residues and build-up during welding processes. It helps ensure clean welds on metal surfaces, enhancing welding quality. The silicone-free composition allows for smooth, clean surfaces without affecting subsequent painting or coating processes. With high performance and fast evaporation, it provides a reliable solution for industrial welding applications.

allData.name: Rust Remover
allData.description: Rust remover is formulated to effectively dissolve and clean rust, oxidation, and dirt from metal surfaces. With its strong solvent properties, it quickly cleans rusted and contaminated areas, extending the life of metals and improving their workability. Easy to use, it delivers excellent results in industrial maintenance processes. Rust remover simplifies metal surface maintenance and provides high-performance cleaning.

allData.name: W 44 T® Multi Spray
allData.description: W 44 T® Multi Spray is a versatile cleaner and protective spray ideal for a wide range of applications. It effectively cleans and maintains metal surfaces, plastics, and other materials by dissolving rust, corrosion, and dirt, while also forming a protective layer for long-lasting protection. It evaporates quickly and delivers effective results without leaving residues. Suitable for both industrial and home use, it offers a high-performance solution.

allData.name: Aluminum Spray A-400 - Glossy
allData.description: Aluminum Spray A-400 offers a brilliant and aesthetic coating for aluminum surfaces, delivering outstanding results. This special formula not only provides high gloss and protection but also effectively corrects surface imperfections and color variations. It dries quickly, ensuring a long-lasting and durable finish. Ideal for both industrial and decorative applications, this spray presents a high-performance solution for your aesthetic and protective needs.

allData.name: Stainless Steel Spray - Special Clear
allData.description: Stainless Steel Spray is a chemical coating based on acrylic resin and stainless steel pigments, offering resistance to corrosion and weather conditions. It contains components such as chromium, nickel, and manganese in its alloy structure, providing the appearance of processed stainless steel. This spray is suitable for situations requiring a durable and effective protective layer. Weicon Stainless Steel Spray can be used to repair damaged stainless steel parts in truck bodies, silos, pipelines, and outdoor applications. Additionally, it is suitable for decorative purposes and for visually enhancing glass, wood, stone, ceramics, and many plastic surfaces.

allData.name: Metal Fluid
allData.description: Metal Fluid is a maintenance and cleaning product designed for matte and polished surfaces and is NSF certified. Metal Fluid protects, cleans, and maintains metal surfaces, as well as ceramics, wood, glass, and plastics. Additionally, it does not affect scratched or printed markings, nor does it dissolve plastic surfaces or rubber sealants.

allData.name: Zinc Spray
allData.description: Zinc Spray provides excellent corrosion protection for metal surfaces. Its zinc-based formula creates a protective coating that offers superior resistance to rust and oxidation. It helps ensure that metal parts are long-lasting and durable, dries quickly, and leaves a smooth finish without any residue. Ideal for industrial, automotive, and construction applications, zinc spray is an effective product for protecting metal surfaces.

allData.name: Chelox Drilling, Cutting and Guiding Gel
allData.description: Chelox Drilling, Cutting and Guiding Gel is a specially formulated liquid designed to enhance efficiency in cutting and drilling operations. By increasing the smoothness of tools and materials, it facilitates smoother and more precise drilling and cutting processes. This gel reduces heat, prolonging tool life and minimizing damage to workpiece surfaces, resulting in cleaner cuts. Suitable for a variety of materials such as metal, plastic, and wood, Inter Drilling, Cutting, and Guiding Gel is an ideal aid for both professional and amateur users. With its ease of use, this product significantly enhances work processes.

allData.name: Weicon Drilling and Cutting Spray
allData.description: Weicon Drilling and Cutting Spray is a specialized product that delivers excellent performance in drilling and cutting operations. This spray enhances the smoothness of cutting tools, enabling more precise and faster execution of tasks. By reducing high temperatures, Weicon Drilling and Cutting Spray extends the lifespan of tools and can be effectively used on various materials such as metal, plastic, and wood. Additionally, its spray form offers ease of application, helping to achieve clean results on the workpiece surface. Ideal for both professional and amateur users, this product significantly improves work processes.

allData.name: Winkel Wincut Drilling, Cutting and Guide Pulling Oil
allData.description: Winkel Wincut Drilling, Cutting and Guide Pulling Oil is an excellent cutting fluid for machining, tapping, and guiding operations on aluminum, stainless steel, and all steel surfaces. This product minimizes friction, extending the life of cutting tools and providing a smoother cut during operations. Effective even at high temperatures, this cutting fluid enhances operational efficiency. However, it is not recommended for use on yellow and copper surfaces, as it is incompatible with these materials.

allData.name: Weicon Bio-Cut
allData.description: Weicon Bio-Cut is a cutting fluid that is free from mineral oil and biologically biodegradable. With its excellent lubrication properties, it enables higher cutting speeds and longer tool life, thus enhancing the cutting performance of tools. Weicon Bio-Cut can be used in various industrial applications for drilling, turning, milling, reaming, cutting, tapping, and screwing operations on a wide range of materials, including all types of steel, cast iron, stainless steel, copper, brass, aluminum, and their alloys.

allData.name: Safety Shoes
allData.description: Safety shoes are specially designed footwear aimed at protecting users in their work environments. Typically constructed with features such as steel toes, slip-resistant soles, and durable materials, these shoes minimize risks related to falls, crushing, and slipping. They are commonly used across various industries, particularly in construction, manufacturing, and industrial sectors. Ergonomically designed to provide both comfort and safety, work safety shoes help maintain foot health during long periods of wear. Additionally, they can be equipped with extra functions such as waterproofing and anti-static properties, making them suitable for different working conditions. Beyond enhancing worker safety, these shoes also positively impact job efficiency.

allData.name: Protective Glasses
allData.description: Protective glasses are specially designed personal protective equipment aimed at safeguarding the eyes from various hazards. They typically offer protection against chemicals, dust, light, UV radiation, and impacts. Widely used in sectors such as construction, laboratories, mining, and industry, these goggles are made from durable and lightweight materials. Equipped with features like anti-fog, anti-scratch, and UV protection, they ensure users maintain a clear line of sight. The ergonomic design provides comfort during prolonged use. Protective goggles are crucial for workplace safety, helping to prevent eye injuries and thereby enhancing the health and safety of workers.

allData.name: Protective Mask
allData.description: Protective masks are designed to shield users from harmful airborne substances, dust, chemicals, and microorganisms. Available in various types, they are typically manufactured to standards such as N95, FFP2, and FFP3, effectively protecting the respiratory system. These masks are widely used in many sectors, including construction, healthcare, industry, and laboratories. Easy to use, protective masks feature leak-proof designs that prevent external pollutants from entering. Additionally, some masks offer UV protection or moisture-resistant features to enhance user comfort. Protective masks are crucial for health safety, helping to prevent the spread of infections and thereby safeguarding the health of both individuals and the community.

allData.name: Nitrile Gloves
allData.description: Nitrile gloves are a type of personal protective equipment designed to protect against chemicals, bacteria, and viruses. They are an ideal alternative for users with latex allergies, offering a flexible design that allows for comfortable use without restricting finger movement. Commonly used in medical, food processing, cleaning, and industrial applications, nitrile gloves provide high resistance to chemicals and cuts, while also being waterproof to prevent liquid contamination. Available in various thicknesses and lengths to meet users' needs, nitrile gloves enhance hygiene while improving safety, ultimately making work processes more efficient.

allData.name: Nitrile Examination Gloves
allData.description: Nitrile examination gloves are a type of personal protective equipment widely used in the medical and healthcare sectors, offering high durability and flexibility. They are an excellent alternative for individuals with latex allergies, providing effective protection against chemicals, bacteria, and viruses. Especially favored in hospitals, clinics, and laboratories, these gloves help maintain a hygienic environment during examinations and procedures. Nitrile examination gloves allow for comfortable use without restricting finger movement and feature leak-proof properties to prevent liquid contamination. Designed for single use, they are changed after each use to reduce the risk of infection. With various size and thickness options, they provide tailored solutions to enhance both safety and comfort for users.

allData.name: Welding Goggles
allData.description: Welding goggles are specially designed personal protective equipment aimed at safeguarding the eyes during welding operations. They provide protection against high temperatures, UV rays, bright lights, and metal particle splatter. Typically made from polycarbonate or glass lenses, these goggles are impact-resistant and scratch-resistant, ensuring durability. Their ergonomic designs enhance user comfort, allowing for a clear line of sight during welding tasks. Additionally, various lens colors and filter options are available depending on the type of welding, which helps protect the eyes from harmful radiation while providing clear visibility. Using welding goggles not only prevents eye injuries but also creates a safer working environment, thereby improving the efficiency of welding processes.

allData.name: Safety Helmet
allData.description: Safety Helmet is designed to protect your head from impacts and falling objects. Made from durable materials, it features shock-absorbing pads for added protection. Its lightweight design allows for comfortable long-term wear, and adjustable headbands ensure a perfect fit for various head sizes. Additionally, ventilation holes provide better comfort in hot conditions. Safety helmets are an ideal choice for enhancing safety in various sectors, including construction, mining, energy, and industry.

allData.name: Aluminum Welding Wire
allData.description: Aluminum welding wire is a high-performance welding material used for joining aluminum and aluminum alloys. Its lightweight and corrosion-resistant properties make it a popular choice in sectors such as automotive, aerospace, shipbuilding, and construction. Aluminum welding wire offers excellent electrical and thermal conductivity, ensuring smooth and strong connections during the welding process. Typically used with MIG and TIG welding methods, these wires contribute to stable welding operations and the production of high-quality weld seams. Available in various alloy types and thicknesses, aluminum welding wire allows for the selection of the best welding solution tailored to specific project needs.

allData.name: Gas Welding Spray
allData.description: Gas welding spray is a protective product used during welding operations to prevent spattering metal particles from adhering to the welding gun, workpiece, and surrounding areas. This spray is applied in a thin layer on welding surfaces to minimize damage and contamination caused by spatter, thereby reducing post-welding cleanup efforts. Additionally, it extends the lifespan of welding equipment, allowing for more efficient and uninterrupted operations. With its fast-drying properties, gas shielded welding spray offers easy and practical application. It aids in achieving a smooth weld on metal surfaces, enhances weld quality, and shortens labor time.

allData.name: Gas Welding Wire
allData.description: Gas welding wire is a welding material used for joining metal parts under gas protection. It is typically employed in MIG (Metal Inert Gas) and MAG (Metal Active Gas) welding processes, with suitable varieties available for welding different metals such as steel, stainless steel, and aluminum. This type of welding wire ensures smooth melting and high-quality weld seams. During the welding process, it is used in conjunction with a protective gas that prevents oxidation and contamination of the metal, helping to create a cleaner and stronger weld area. This highly efficient method provides fast and reliable results in industrial applications.

allData.name: Welding Gloves
allData.description: Welding gloves are personal protective equipment designed to shield the hands from high temperatures, sparks, and metal splatter during welding operations. Typically made from durable leather materials, these gloves exhibit resistance to high heat. In addition to thermal protection, welding gloves offer flexibility, allowing for dexterity while performing welding tasks. Their long cuff design further enhances safety by protecting the wrists and forearms. Various models are available to suit different welding methods, such as arc welding, gas shielded welding, and MIG welding, ensuring optimal protection tailored to the specific type of welding being performed.

allData.name: Stainless Steel Electrode
allData.description: Stainless steel electrodes are specialized electrodes used for welding stainless steel materials. They offer high corrosion resistance, durability, and heat resistance, enabling the safe and robust joining of stainless steel components. These electrodes are typically preferred for welding high-alloy steels, helping to maintain the surface properties of stainless steel and produce high-quality, smooth weld seams. They are widely used in industrial applications, particularly in the food, chemical, energy, and marine sectors. Stainless steel electrodes are an ideal choice for providing long-lasting and reliable welding connections.

allData.name: Stainless Steel Welding Wire
allData.description: Stainless steel welding wire is a welding material used for joining stainless steel components. This wire maintains the high corrosion resistance and durability of stainless steel, creating strong and high-quality connections during welding. It is commonly used in MIG and TIG welding methods and provides a fine weld seam. Stainless steel welding wire is preferred in industries where corrosion resistance is critical, such as food, chemical, petrochemical, and marine sectors. Various types are available to suit different stainless steel alloys, helping achieve effective and reliable welding results across various projects.

allData.name: Rutile Electrode
allData.description: Rutile electrode is a type of electrode with a high titanium dioxide (rutile) coating, specifically designed for welding mild steels. It is known for its ease of ignition and re-ignition, making it very user-friendly. During welding, it produces minimal spatter, allowing for a clean weld seam. Rutile electrodes can be used in all welding positions and provide a smooth appearance to the weld. They are commonly preferred in construction, general manufacturing, and maintenance sectors. Additionally, they form a thin slag layer around the weld joint, which helps protect the weld.

allData.name: Welding Helmet
allData.description: Welding Helmet is a personal protective equipment designed to protect the eyes and face during welding operations. It is typically made from materials that are resistant to high temperatures and impacts. With its automatic darkening feature, the lens darkens when the welding arc is detected, shielding the eyes from UV and IR radiation. The adjustable headband and lightweight design ensure comfort during prolonged use. Welding helmets can be used with various welding methods and are essential for enhancing workplace safety.

allData.name: Welding Helmet Lens
allData.description: Welding Helmet Lens is one of the most crucial components of a welding helmet, designed to protect the eyes during welding operations. It is typically made from specialized materials that are resistant to impacts, heat, and UV/IR radiation. With various shade levels available, the lens provides suitable protection depending on the type of welding being performed. Its easily replaceable design allows users to maintain the helmet's effectiveness. The welding helmet lens enhances workplace safety by enabling secure and efficient welding processes.

allData.name: Welding Pliers
allData.description: Welding Pliers is a tool used to hold metal pieces together and secure them in the correct position during welding operations. Typically made from durable steel, it is known for its heat resistance. Its ergonomic design provides ease of use and comfort while holding. Welding clamps facilitate the welding process, especially in hard-to-reach areas or complex projects, enhancing overall work efficiency. Available in various sizes and designs, this tool is ideal for both professional welders and hobbyists.

allData.name: Welding Torches
allData.description: Welding Torches are equipment used to heat and join metal pieces during welding operations. They typically produce high temperatures using a combination of oxygen and acetylene or other gases. With various sizes and tip types, they are suitable for different welding methods (such as TIG, MIG, or gas welding). The structure of welding torches includes adjustable valves for controlling gas flow and ignition systems. Additionally, they are made from materials resistant to high temperatures, ensuring reliability under intense use conditions. Welding torches are widely used in metalworking, automotive, and construction industries.

allData.name: Contact Nozzle
allData.description: Contact Nozzle is a component used in electrical connections, designed to join metal surfaces. These parts enable the connection of two or more wires to transmit electrical current. Contact sockets are made from durable materials and are resistant to harsh conditions such as high temperatures and pressure. They come in various types and sizes, providing flexibility for different applications. Contact sockets are commonly used in automotive, industrial equipment, and electrical systems.

allData.name: Welding Nozzles
allData.description: Welding Nozzles are components that regulate and direct the flow of gas during welding operations. Typically made from metal and ceramic materials, these nozzles are designed to withstand high temperatures and ensure a stable gas flow during the welding process. Available in various diameters and designs, they are tailored for different welding methods and optimized to enhance the quality of the workpiece. Welding nozzles can be used with both argon and carbon dioxide gases and are commonly preferred in MIG, TIG, and plasma welding applications.

allData.name: Welding Pastes
allData.description: Welding Pastes are special chemicals used to clean and protect metal surfaces during welding operations. These fluxes are designed to prevent oxidation and ensure better bonding of metals during the welding process. Typically acidic or basic in nature, welding fluxes are applied to metal surfaces to aid in the removal of residues and contaminants. Additionally, they create a protective layer on the surface to enhance the flow of the weld. Welding fluxes are commonly used in the automotive, metalworking, and construction industries.

allData.name: Metal Cutting Discs
allData.description: Metal cutting discs are durable and high-performance grinding products used for cutting various metal materials. They are commonly preferred for cutting steel, stainless steel, iron, and other hard metals. Thanks to their thin structure, cutting discs provide precise and smooth cuts, preventing damage to the material. Available in various diameters and thicknesses, these discs can be attached to grinding machines to perform fast and efficient cutting operations. They are widely used in industrial settings, construction projects, and repair tasks, offering high durability and a long lifespan.

allData.name: Industrial Metal Cutting Discs
allData.description: Industrial metal cutting discs are specifically designed for heavy cutting operations that require high durability and performance. They enable the rapid and precise cutting of hard metals such as steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and iron. Typically used for cutting thick metal plates, pipes, and profile materials, these discs provide minimal burr formation and a smooth cutting surface due to their thin design. Engineered for high-speed and intensive use, these discs are long-lasting and resistant to wear. They are widely preferred in industrial manufacturing, construction, and maintenance applications.

allData.name: Inox Cutting Discs
allData.description: Inox cutting discs are specially designed for cutting stainless steel (inox) and other corrosion-resistant metals. These discs provide precision and smoothness during the cutting of stainless steel materials while preventing contamination and rust formation on the material as the disc wears down. Thanks to their thin and durable construction, they ensure clean and fast cuts with minimal burr formation. Inox cutting discs are widely used in industrial applications, particularly in sectors that work with stainless steel and thin metal materials. Additionally, they maintain the structural integrity of the material due to low heat generation during cutting.

allData.name: Cut & Cut Inox Cutting Discs
allData.description: Cut & Cut Inox cutting discs are high-performance discs specifically developed for cutting stainless steel and other corrosion-resistant metals. With their thin design, these discs provide fast and precise cuts while minimizing heat generation to prevent material deformation. The Cut & Cut series is manufactured from durable and wear-resistant materials, ensuring high efficiency even under intensive use conditions. Their low burr formation results in clean cutting surfaces, saving time in work processes. These discs are widely preferred in industrial applications, particularly in the stainless steel sector.

allData.name: Casting Cutting Discs
allData.description: Cast Cutting Discs are durable and high-performance discs designed for cutting cast iron, aluminum, and other metal alloys. With their thick construction, these discs provide long-lasting durability and are effective for tough cutting applications. They are particularly suitable for cutting thick metal parts, cast products, and hard metals. The low heat generation minimizes material deformation while allowing for a smooth cutting surface. Cast cutting discs are widely used in industrial applications, construction, and metalworking sectors, making them an excellent choice for both professional and amateur users.

allData.name: Marble Cutting Discs
allData.description: Marble Cutting Discs are specially designed, high-quality discs used for cutting marble, granite, and other natural stones. These discs are manufactured to ensure precise and clean cuts in hard stone materials. Their thin structure allows for low heat generation, preventing material deformation while making smooth cuts without damaging the surface of the stone. Marble cutting discs come in various diameters and thicknesses, making them compatible with different cutting machines. Widely preferred in construction, interior design, and stone processing sectors, these discs offer high efficiency and durability for both professional and amateur users.

allData.name: Aluminum Cutting Discs
allData.description: Aluminum Cutting Discs are high-performance discs specifically designed for cutting aluminum and other lightweight metals. These discs ensure precise and clean cuts in aluminum while preventing material deformation due to low heat generation. Their thin and durable structure helps achieve smooth cutting surfaces with minimal burr formation during the cutting process. Aluminum cutting discs are available in various diameters and thicknesses to be compatible with different machines. Widely used in construction, automotive, and metal processing sectors, these discs offer an excellent option for both professional and amateur users. Thanks to their high efficiency and durability, they perform effectively even under intensive use conditions.

allData.name: ZA Casting Cutting Discs
allData.description: ZA Cast Cutting Discs are high-quality discs specifically designed to provide superior performance in cutting cast iron and other metal alloys. These discs offer long life and durability in challenging cutting applications. Thanks to their special components, ZA cutting discs minimize material deformation with high cutting speed and low heat generation, resulting in cleaner and smoother surfaces during cutting operations. Available in various diameters and thicknesses, these discs are suitable for both professional and amateur users. Preferred in various fields such as metal processing, construction, and industrial applications, ZA cast cutting discs facilitate work processes by providing high efficiency and reliability.

allData.name: AC Casting Cutting Discs
allData.description: AC Cast Cutting Discs are high-performance discs specially designed for cutting cast iron, aluminum, and other metal alloys. These discs provide long life and durability in challenging cutting operations due to their robust construction. AC cutting discs minimize material deformation by offering high cutting speeds along with low heat generation, allowing for smoother and cleaner surfaces during cutting. Compatible with various machines due to different diameter and thickness options, these discs are widely used in industrial applications, metal processing, and construction sectors. AC cast cutting discs offer an ideal option for both professional and amateur users, demonstrating excellent performance in terms of efficiency and reliability.

allData.name: Metal Cutting Fixed Table Discs
allData.description: Metal Cutting Fixed Table Discs are durable and high-performance cutting discs specifically designed for metal processing applications. These discs are intended for mounting on stationary bench machines and can effectively be used for cutting various metal materials, such as cast iron, steel, and aluminum. Thanks to their high-quality construction, these discs offer long service life and minimize material deformation with low heat generation, helping to achieve cleaner cutting surfaces. Available in various diameters and thicknesses, metal cutting bench discs are compatible with different cutting operations, making them ideal for both industrial and amateur users. With high cutting speeds and durability, they deliver excellent performance even in challenging cutting conditions, thereby enhancing the efficiency of work processes.

allData.name: Casting Cutting Fixed Table Discs
allData.description: Casting Cutting Fixed Table Discs are high-quality cutting discs specialized for cutting cast iron and other metal alloys. Designed for use on stationary bench machines, these discs offer long life and reliable performance in challenging cutting applications due to their durable construction. They minimize material deformation with low heat generation, allowing for cleaner and smoother surfaces during cutting. Available in various diameters and thicknesses, these discs are compatible with different machines and are widely used in industrial metal processing, construction, and automotive sectors. Providing an ideal solution for both professional and amateur users, casting cutting bench discs facilitate work processes with high efficiency and performance.

allData.name: Rail Cutting Discs
allData.description: Rail Cutting Discs are specially designed high-performance discs used primarily for cutting rail systems and metal structures. These discs are developed for effective use in cutting hard metal materials such as iron, steel, and aluminum. Thanks to their durable construction, rail cutting discs provide long life and reliability under challenging cutting conditions. They minimize material deformation with low heat generation, allowing for cleaner and smoother surfaces during cutting. Available in various diameters and thicknesses, these discs can be used with compatible machines and are ideal for both industrial and amateur metal processing applications. Rail cutting discs enhance work efficiency by accelerating cutting processes with their high cutting speeds and durability.

allData.name: Metal Deburring Discs
allData.description: Metal Deburring Discs are high-quality and durable discs designed for cleaning burrs and sharp edges that occur after cutting or welding processes in metalworking. Available in various sizes and shapes, these discs are compatible with a wide range of machines and hand tools, making them suitable for use in many industries, including automotive, construction, and metal manufacturing. With low heat generation, they minimize material deformation while providing fast and effective cleaning thanks to their high cutting power. Manufactured in accordance with occupational safety standards, metal deburring discs offer a safe and efficient solution for both professional and amateur users.

allData.name: Metal Plus Deburring Discs
allData.description: Metal Plus Deburring Discs are specially designed products for the fast and effective cleaning of burrs and sharp edges that occur after cutting and welding processes in metalworking. Made from high-quality materials, these discs stand out for their durability and long-lasting performance. Available in various sizes and thicknesses, Metal Plus deburring discs work compatibly with a range of machines and hand tools, making them widely used in many industries, including automotive, construction, and metal manufacturing. Their low heat generation helps reduce material deformation, while their high cutting power contributes to achieving clean and smooth surfaces. Offering a safe and efficient working experience, these discs are an ideal solution for both professional and amateur users.

allData.name: Inox Deburring Discs
allData.description: Inox Deburring Discs are high-quality discs specially designed for cleaning burrs and sharp edges on stainless steel and other metal surfaces. Made from durable materials, these discs are available in various sizes and thicknesses for use with both hand tools and fixed workstations. Inox deburring discs minimize material deformation due to their low heat generation while providing fast and effective cleaning with high cutting power. Commonly preferred in the automotive, construction, and metalworking industries, these discs offer a safe and efficient solution for both professional and amateur users. They help achieve a clean and smooth surface by removing fine burrs from stainless steel surfaces.

allData.name: Cast Deburring Discs
allData.description: Casting Deburring Discs are high-performance discs specially designed to effectively remove burrs and surface defects that occur after casting processes. Available in various sizes and thicknesses, these discs can be used with hand tools and fixed workstations in metalworking processes. Made from durable materials, casting deburring discs provide long-lasting performance and minimize material deformation due to their low heat generation. Commonly preferred in the automotive, construction, and metal manufacturing industries, these discs offer a quick and effective solution for both professional and amateur users. They help achieve clean and smooth surfaces with high cutting power, thus enhancing work quality.

allData.name: ZA Plus Deburring Discs
allData.description: ZA Plus Deburring Discs are high-quality discs specifically designed to effectively remove burrs and surface defects that occur after casting processes. Manufactured using advanced material technology, these discs are notable for their durability and long lifespan. They are compatible with various hand tools and fixed workstations, available in different sizes and thicknesses. With low heat generation, ZA Plus deburring discs minimize material deformation while providing fast and effective cleaning with high cutting power. allData.name: Titanium Fasteners
allData.description: Titanium fasteners are specialized components that stand out for their lightweight and high durability, particularly used in demanding conditions. Their excellent resistance to corrosion makes them a popular choice in marine, aerospace, and automotive industries. Titanium is also known for its high-temperature tolerance and exceptional mechanical properties, making it an ideal material for strong and lightweight structures. These fasteners are available in various forms, such as screws, nuts, and rivets, and are designed to suit different industrial applications. With their superior performance and long lifespan, titanium fasteners are an indispensable choice for engineers and designers seeking reliable solutions.

allData.name: Custom Manufactured Fasteners
allData.description: Custom manufactured fasteners are non-standard components designed and manufactured to meet specific needs and project requirements. These fasteners are produced based on unique dimensions, material properties, or design specifications, catering to the specific demands of customers. They are commonly used in engineering and industrial applications, produced with considerations for durability, corrosion resistance, and high performance. Custom fasteners can be utilized across various sectors, including automotive, aerospace, construction, and machinery, and can be tailored to enhance customer satisfaction. This customization ensures project efficiency and safety while also providing cost advantages.

allData.name: 10.9 and 12.9 Fasteners
allData.description: 10.9 and 12.9 fasteners are high-strength steel screws and bolts specifically designed for applications requiring significant strength and durability. These fasteners are commonly used in industrial, automotive, and construction sectors. Class 10.9 fasteners are known for their high tensile strength, while class 12.9 fasteners provide even greater strength and durability. Class 10.9 fasteners are made from carbon steel, whereas class 12.9 fasteners are manufactured from high-carbon steel and are heat-treated for increased hardness. These features enable both types to reliably carry heavy loads and perform well in challenging conditions. With their dependable performance, 10.9 and 12.9 fasteners enhance efficiency in industrial applications while prioritizing safety. Their high durability ensures long-lasting and robust connections, which are critical for the success of various projects.

allData.name: DIN 6885 Type (A) and (B) Keys
allData.description: DIN 6885 (A) and (B) Type Keys are connection elements designed to provide effective torque transmission between shafts and gears. Type A features a thin and lightweight profile, while Type B is thicker and more robust, making them suitable for various application requirements. Both types are manufactured according to DIN 6885 standards and are typically made from steel, stainless steel, or aluminum. These keys are commonly used in machinery and automation systems, such as gearboxes and motors. Their high durability and reliable connections minimize wear, enhancing system efficiency. Additionally, they facilitate easy assembly and disassembly, speeding up maintenance tasks.
